ThingDef.RPP_Component.label: Robotic Component
ThingDef.RPP_Component.description: Robotic Components are used as logic circuits within a robotic matrix.
ThingDef.RPP_Matrix_Basic.label: Robotic Matrix (Basic)
ThingDef.RPP_Matrix_Basic.description: A robotic logical matrix. Engineered with a basic instruction set allowing it to perform suited tasks at an amateur-class skill level.
ThingDef.RPP_Matrix_Interm.label: Robotic Matrix (Intermediate)
ThingDef.RPP_Matrix_Interm.description: A robotic logical matrix. Engineered with a basic instruction set allowing it to perform suited tasks at a profesional-class skill level.
ThingDef.RPP_Matrix_Adv.label: Robotic Matrix (Advanced)
ThingDef.RPP_Matrix_Adv.description: A robotic logical matrix. Engineered with a basic instruction set allowing it to perform suited tasks at a master-class skill level.
